title: Wall relief group "The Path"
img_alt: Wall relief group The Path by Seiji Kimoto
unterschrift: Wall design town hall and registry office Saarbrücken, single sculpture
intro_text: The wall relief group "The Path" by Seiji Kimoto was acquired in 2000 by the city of Saarbrücken for the registry office in the building of the municipal town hall. The reliefs show the inner path of development of a human who gradually casts off his chains. The registry office as a future location was not known to the artist beforehand.
